ack.p: We thank all patients whose data were used in this study. We also acknowledge the staff from the CTA who contributed to recording and entering data and Abdou Gueye for his support in data analysis. We thank the French GIP ESTHER and the CNLS (Conseil National de Lutte contre le Sida) in Senegal for their technical and financial support in implementing the ESOPE computerized medical files system.
